description: President Trump's legal team on Thursday demanded that the publisher of Michael Wolff's new book, "Fire and Fury: Inside the Trump White House," which is critical of the administration, halt its release and apologize or face legal action.
title: Read the Letter from Trump's Lawyer Demanding Publisher Halt 'Fire and Fury' Book
title_page: Read the Letter from Trump's Lawyer Demanding Publisher Halt 'Fire and Fury' Book - The New York Times
